rotate_hand.description: Rotate the clock hand to the correct time.

press_alarm_ring.description: Press the alarm ring to set or close the alarm.

clean_clock_body.description: Clean the clock body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_whole_clock.description: Clean the entire clock including the clock body, hand, and alarm ring.

reset_time.description: Reset the clock time by rotating the clock hand to the starting position.

set_alarm.description: Set the alarm by pressing the alarm ring.
